title: Ep 222: Cucking, Bulls & Sex Clubs (Ft. Mr. Slithers & Mistress D)
itunes:title: Ep 222: Cucking, Bulls & Sex Clubs (Ft. Mr. Slithers & Mistress D)
description:
This week the duo are joined in the studio with Mr Slithers & Mistress D, a couple who met engaging in Cuck. We talk sex club etiquette, swinger terminology and they share how they actually met in a cucking relationship with a previous partner. Our couple this week is also interracial and we speak to any societal views on Black men with Asian women and how they address it in their relationship. For this week’s Vanilla Sh-t, we dive into sex part advice and tips for beginners (https://www.vice.com/en/article/9393ee/sex-party-advice-tips-for-beginners) & for the Whore’derve our guests share some amazing sex tips regarding couples interested in cuckholding. Tons of gems dropped this episode on the lifestyle.


Follow this week’s guests on Twitter:

Mr Slithers @themanslithers

Petite D @misspetiteD_NYC also visit her website (18+) at misspetitednyc.com


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!


Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions
